question: Elavenil Valarivan has clinched gold in which women's air rifle event at 2018 junior ISSF World Cup in Sydney?
explanation: Indian shooter Elavenil Valarivan (18) shattered the world record and claimed the gold medal in 10m women\'s air rifle event of the season\'s first junior ISSF World Cup in Sydney on March 22, 2018. She shot 249.8 in the women\'s final to claim the top individual honours. Her 631.4 in the qualification was a new world record. Besides her individual podium finish, Elavenil also combined with Shreya Agrawal and Zeena Khitta to claim the team gold medal.
